Sacked UK High Commissioner Phil Goff farewells London as King Charles sends message https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/sacked-uk-high-commissioner-phil-ghil-goff-farewells-farewells-london-as-king-charles-charles-charles-sends-message/7qvefpk4lncg4lncg3fotpytpytiyzy4su/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/sacked-uk-high-commissioner-phil-ghil-goff-farewells-farewells-london-as-king-charles-charles-charles-sends-message/7qvefpk4lncg4lncg3fotpytpytiyzy4su/ Cherie HowieGoff is expected to leave the UK this weekend. Thu, 13 Mar 2025 00:17:22 +0000 A smiling Phil Goff is pictured at a farewell event in London with Marshal of the Diplomatic Corps Alastair Harrison. Goff was fired from his role as UK High Commissioner over comments he made about US president Donald Trump. He will return to New Zealand this weekend.
